# Legion Go data
Attaching and detaching controllers
```bash
# Both attached
[Ukn: 0419740100640464040101010202][Sticks: 80 80 80 80][Buttons 00000000 00000000 00000000][Btn_mid: 00][Trig: 00 00][Ukn: 02][Scroll: 80][Touchpad: 0000 0000 [Gyro LR: 80 80 80 80][Ukn: 00ff33330e04011a0c0000c4142100c40000000000000000000000000000]
# Right attached
[Ukn: 0419740100640464010101010203][Sticks: 80 80 80 80][Buttons 00000000 00000000 00000000][Btn_mid: 00][Trig: 00 00][Ukn: 02][Scroll: 80][Touchpad: 0000 0000 [Gyro LR: 80 80 80 80][Ukn: 00ff330113050130000100c4142100c40000000000000000000000000000]
# Left detached
[Ukn: 0419740100630163040101010302][Sticks: 80 80 80 80][Buttons 00000000 00000000 00000000][Btn_mid: 00][Trig: 00 00][Ukn: 02][Scroll: 80][Touchpad: 0000 0000 [Gyro LR: 80 80 80 80][Ukn: 00ff013313050131000100c4142100c40000000000000000000000000000]
# Both detached (dithering between 2 states)
[Ukn: 0419740100630163010101010303][Sticks: 80 80 80 80][Buttons 00000000 00000000 00000000][Btn_mid: 00][Trig: 00 00][Ukn: 02][Scroll: 80][Touchpad: 0000 0000 [Gyro LR: 80 80 80 80][Ukn: 00ff010113050130000100c4142100c40000000000000000000000000000]
```

Connecting and disconnecting detached
```bash
# Both off
[Ukn: 0419740100000000000100000101][Sticks: 80 80 80 80][Buttons 00000000 00000000 00000000][Btn_mid: 00][Trig: 00 00][Ukn: 02][Scroll: 00][Touchpad: 0000 0000 [Gyro LR: 80 80 80 80][Ukn: 00ff01010e04011c0c0000c4142100e40000000000000000000000000000]
```

```bash
[Ukn: 0419740100630160010101010303][Sticks: 80 80 80 80][Buttons 00000000 00000000 00000000][Btn_mid: 00][Trig: 00 00][Ukn: 02][Scroll: 80][Touchpad: 0000 0000 [Gyro LR: 80 80 80 80][Ukn: 00ff010113050130000100c4142100c40000000000000000000000000000]
# FPS
[Ukn: 0419740100630160010201010303][Sticks: 80 80 80 80][Buttons 00000000 00000000 00000000][Btn_mid: 00][Trig: 00 00][Ukn: 02][Scroll: 80][Touchpad: 0000 0000 [Gyro LR: 80 80 80 80][Ukn: 00ff010113050130000100c4142100c40000000000000000000000000000]
```

Assume `rep` is a report.
 - rep[5]: left controller battery
 - rep[(6 << 3)]: left status
 - rep[7]: right controller battery
 - rep[(8 << 3)]: right status
 - rep[(35 << 3) + 6]: right controller attached
 - rep[(36 << 3) + 6]: left controller attached

status:
0x01: detached
0x04: charged
